description.english: Win 5 challenges in each multiplayer mode (Race, Speed, Speedtrap)
description.german: 5 Herausforderungen in jedem Multiplayer-Modus gewinnen (Rennen, Tempo, Radarfalle)

description.spanish: Gana 5 desafíos en todos los modos multijugador (carrera, velocidad y radar)

description.english: Earn $10 000 in instant challenges

description.spanish: Gana 10.000 $ en desafíos instantáneos

description.english: Drive 500 km (311 miles) using the cockpit view (any game mode)
